and_01:
# RULES
B => A 
D + E => B 
G + H => F 
I + J => G 
G => H 
L + M => K 
O + P => L + N 
N => M 

# QUERIES
?AFKP 

# INITIAL FACTS
=DEIJOP

# EXPECTED RESULT: AFKP is true.
